content.detailedDescription: *(name deleted--cms/sg)and myself were sitting in her yard on a swing. it was a clear warm night. the sun had just set and it was twilight and getting dark. we had a small fire going in our outdoor chiminea. the position of the swing we were sitting on was facing south. when we notice this light moving slowly northward in the night sky. it moved so slowly that we thought it was a balloon at first. it was orange in color at first. then it started to change to reddish in color. yet, it was moving so slowly. it made no sounds at all. it took several minutes for it to move from the south to almost directly going over our head. as it was passing, we made the comment that we were seeing a ufo. we watched as the object changed directions, very slowly. it moved about 1/8 of mile in direction. i noted the winds in the trees. there was a slight breeze coming out of the west, no more than 5 -- 7 mph breeze. as this light was nearing us...I ran into the house to get my binoculars. i came back outside and it was nearly directly overhead of us. i focused the binoculars onto the object as it was almost directly over us. i would estimate that the object was 4,000 feet or so above us. i looked at the light which had been changing color it started out orange to reddish and as now it appeared whitish. i focused on the object and it was clear in my binoculars. it almost had a transparent nature. it was shining whitish with a very faint glowing circular shape. it was now directly overhead and i handed the binoculars to *(name, same as above, deleted--cms/sg)and she viewed it too. the ufo made no sounds or had any lights that would be present on a airplane. it still was drifting and making no sounds heading eastward to the canadian border towards the detroit river. it was then that we noticed another light in the horizon and it was the same as the one we just viewed. it was orange and moving in the same manner. no sounds or lights that you would see on a plane. we viewed 6 of these objects. one of the objects moved almost in a 40 degree angle then began drifting like the others. a couple of the objects drifted almost directly overhead of us. and they too were whitish almost as if they were of a transparent and they were all circular and disk shaped. the reason i say this is because when viewed with the binoculars you could make out the distinct circular disk shaped that it possessed. did anyone else report seeing these objects? all were colored and changed colors, but when they neared us, they appeared to be white. at first were were excited, when i ran into the house to get the binoculars and when i ran back outside and we viewed them. it was exciting then it was kind of frighting. we watched the object until they moved beyond us to the east, which is towards the detroit river and canada.
content.summary: A round circular light that changed colored several times.

content.detailedDescription:
*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).

please, watch this video... i dont know if it is real... but, it impressive!
content.summary: Video

content.detailedDescription:
When i was a teen i used to live in a random  cul-de-sac in the middle of the country surrounded by nothing but fields and a lake. one night i went out for a walk and as i was walking i noticed that  a street light which was usually the only light to be found for a ways, had a second light floating above it, a single sort of vertical oval shaped light, maybe 5-6 feet above it, unmoving, a bright but hazy white/orange light, after watching it for about a minute i continued with my walk and shortly turned around and walked home and took notice that the light was still there. the next day in bright sunshine i walked down to the streetlight to check it out and there was nothing above the streetlight or in the vicinity that would create any kind of light.
 a few weeks later i went out for another late night walk ( as was my fashion)  as upon returning my eye was drawn to the open access point of the lake my house was on, i had barely  stepped near it when i saw very clearly 3 fairly large horizontal oval lights, 2 white, one orangish/red, spaced about 3 feet away from each other hovering above my lake just above the tree line, i stopped out of curiosity trying to listen for the sound of a plane  but heard only a very soft, very low whooshing-like pulsing, i tried to think of any and all possible explanations besides the one i am reporting now, but i didn't live near any towers, tall buildings, power stations or water towers, i heard no sound of planes or helicopters and the lights weren't moving, and they were very clearly just above my lake which has no means of supporting any kind of light.
my immediate thought was " go inside and get the camera" but i was mesmerized by its strangeness and also a little afraid, and i worried that the lights might disappear by the time i came back to the spot. i watched the lights for about 5 minutes, and they never seemed to move, and as i watched the light farthest on the right which was white and the middle light which was orange/red changed, and now the far right was orange/red and the middle was white. i dont know why but i was suddenly frightened, thinking of all the silly movies id seen, and i felt like the lights were watching me as well, i grew rather anxious and decided to quickly walk home, as i was doing so i kept looking behind me back at the lights, at which point i realized they had been moving because they were now higher above the treetops then they had been before, they had just been moving too slowly for me to notice. i reached home and firmly locked the door behind me and drew all the curtains to appease my own uneasiness. the next day i returned to the spot and saw no sign of the lights.
content.summary: Three lights seen over lake

content.detailedDescription: This light was the second one i saw that night. this light was more closer and clearer than the other. there are smaller lights surrounding it with colors of blue and white.They are at a distance from the main light. this light moves and scans around from left to right then moves up and down.
content.summary: The second light i saw the same night but a different location in the sky

content.detailedDescription: This sighting is not the first for me, i can set outside my house on most nights and see strange lights flashing,blinking and fading in and out. i was able to get a better view with my cell phone than my camera. this light will stay sometimes for hours while moving in different directions.If you set it to full screen you can see the small blue and white lights that are blinking a little ways away from the light.
content.summary: Light that moved around and scanned, there were other small flashes of light surrounding the larger one.

content.detailedDescription: Mysterious white sphere orbiting around my security cameras.
content.summary: White sphere

content.detailedDescription: I was going to sleep. as soon as i closed my eyes i open them and find this blinking light. i thought it was a plane. i look for a second and see this is not a regular plane. i looked closely and saw it looked like a c with a divide in the middle like a stencil c like the font. it was a bright red. i ran out of the back door to see it better. it had a little tail. i finally lost sight of it after watching it for five minutes, gliding through the air.
content.summary: Red ufo looks like a stencil c

content.detailedDescription:
Report called in to debbie ziegelmeyer missouri mufon state director.
full report will be attached below.
content.summary: Red sphere with inside being lighter red with shape changing to elliptical.

content.detailedDescription: Saw multiple ufo's , on different dates.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Encountered a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
***this report was submitted by the chief investigator *(name deleted--cms/sg) of n. cal.****

"i was driving on my way to work on cherry st when a big bright light caught my attention. it seemed too big to be an airplane. as i continued driving, the light appeared to become bigger. when i turned right on stevenson, i pulled over and took a picture of it with my cell phone. i had to get to work, so i left."
content.summary: While driving to work, seen huge unknown light

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard @11pm having a cigar and looking @ cloudy sky. after a short period of time, 15 min. or so clouds dissipated but clouds near moon spread out and formed perfect circle around the moon. the moon was in the center of what could be described as giant clock face and the outer ring was 15 to 20 moon lengths out from the center moon. i estimate the cloud ring to be near 2 or 3 moon lengths wide. not a ufo as such but plenty strange nonetheless.
content.summary: Observed perfect circle around near full moon

content.detailedDescription:
I'll make this short...

back when i was in high school, my buddy and i were out for a stroll around 8pm in the summer. and we usually talk about screwed up stuff, like alien theories and conspiracies etc.

just beginning our walk, we noticed a weird engine sound in the thick overcast weather above us. we didn't think anything of it, that time.

so now we were deep into a conversation about the possibilities of an alien species watching us, right now as we walked in the night and we were just getting to an open area where the sky wasn't covered in overhanging trees. while we walked on the road in the open area, we heard that engine sound again. it sounded like something was directly above us in the fast moving clouds, we then got a little scared. we continued walking and before we knew it the overcast was gone and we were looking up at a fairly lit up milky way. we did not stop to look at the stars and we continued on our way. just then, i saw something over then next tree line. 

a red ball, jumped up out from the tree line and danced around for a couple of seconds then left so fast it disappeared in front of our eyes. 

i like to describe it as if someone had a laser pointer, and were pointing it at the stars and waving it around. sporadic small movements in  different directions then gone.

my buddy remembers the night, but not the sighting really, i try to refresh his memory and he just plays along. the only proof i had to back up the story, is "why did we run all the way back to your house" i told him this and he instantly remembered us, running full speed 20 blocks...

i've seen other ufo's, but this is the first. 

i remember i had an alien abduction dream that night...I really wish i didn't believe...
content.summary: Talking about ufo's then...

content.detailedDescription: This incident reported by mufon investigator beverly trout.....Time of video recorded at 12:11 p.M. on september 5, 2010.  male witness was facing north by side of his tractor, when he heard a noise which sounded like a horse kicking the side of a stall (and witness readily says that maybe the noise was caused by a horse nearby - he has a mini-horse and a mini-mare, and their shelter is a small building nearby.)  witness turned 180 degrees and looked to the south, and saw to the sse a disk-shaped object about 1/2 mile away hovering over a bean field at about 50 degrees up.  witness called to his wife (who was in the garage/machine shed-type building nearby to "go get the camera!"  witness, who walks with a decided limp, then turned and walked west for approximately 7 seconds until he stood at the center of a big iron gate to again look south.  that's when he realized that now the soundless object had moved to 90 degrees over his head at about 50 feet altitude.  (he likens the altitude to about 10 feet above a nearby 40 foot tree.  male witness says there were rings on the underside of the object, and that as he looked up, the center ring projected/moved downward perhaps 10 feet under the object.  he specifies his position as under the northern edge of the center ring.  he says the ring opened and expelled some sort of balls the size of baseballs and/or softballs, with perhaps one or two the size of basketballs, which then landed on his hat, arms and legs (anc caused some sensation on his arm hair), and that these no-weight balls somehow caused him to have odd perceptions as he stood there.  for instance, it seemed that the balls caused him to feel himself standing a distance behind himself, watching himself standing at the gate.  he speaks as if there was a kind of bubble effect, but with no sheen to it, and when he looked at the bubble, it was as if the bubble projected images of the garage or himself, etc. but only projected images the size of the bubbles/balls themselves, not the actual size of the garage or himself, etc.  he says he wonders if it's like looking into another dimension.  following his experience with the balls,the craft expelled/formed a haze surrounding itself.  to the witness, it seemed as if all this was happening in a very brief few seconds or 2-3 minutes at the most, but when the balls stopped interacting with him, he thought to wonder if his wife had gotten the camera, and began walking west toward the backyard fence where she was positioned some 70 feet away.  as he walked, his perception was that the object, including the haze, began to float/move slowly to the west with him, and as he approached the backyard fence gate, he saw that his wife was taking pictur4es, which he thought were photographs with their digital camera.  however, from dialogue on a 2 minute, 20-second videotape of the ufo, discovered a couple weeks later when viewing a crop duster video taken in july, 2010, it appears that his wife was actually just finishing taping the ufo video.  (((as he approached his wife in the back yard, the dialogue heard in the last few seconds on the video is as follows:  as her husband is approaching, the wife calls out, "i like that ring!  what is that?  some kind of a...."  he interrupts and says, "i don't know what it is."  and she finishes her sentence by saying, "tornado?"  then she adds, "it looks like an alien ship."  investigator's note:  if a weather phenomenon had occurred, male witness would surely have recognized it as such, but instead, it appears to investigator trout that his comment, "i don't know what it is." simply reflects puzzlement rather than recognition of ordinary clouds, as suggested later by a meteorologist.  at this point, male witness' perception is that the sighting event has taken perhaps only a few seconds, or 2-3 minutes.  (((please note:  when the digital photos and the video were later examined, the times recorded led an iowa investigator, greg andersen, to surmise that the apparent time difference shows at least 23 minutes between the videotape and the last of the photos taken by the wife witness.)))  male witness likens color of the disk to "aluminum tinted by diesel smoke," and later he characterized the color as "pewter."  he says the ship looked darker than the haze generated around it, and that the center of the rings looked darker than the ship, although the ring edges looked grayish-silver.  when the disk moved overhead, male witness could not see the eastern edge of the disk because of a treeline to his left (east) of his position.  (((apparent size of disk when hovered 1/2 mile away at 50 degrees yields size parameters of 1,405 to 2,054 feet..These size parameters are arrived at by using an apparent size of 20 degrees, and an apparent size of 30 degrees in a trigonometry program used by iowa mufon to arrive at an approximate size.)))  neither husband nor wife thought to look for the western edge of the object.  (this seems somewhat understandable, since they specify its great size as it hovered so low overhead.)  in the backyard, male witness took his eyes off the disk to look briefly north toward the house, and when he turned again to face south, the disk and the haze quickly dissolved/blinked out, and the object was gone.  see investigator notes for investigation conclusion.
content.summary: Large disk hovered over field 1/2 mile away moved overhead at 50 feet altitutde

content.detailedDescription: Let me begin by saying that i am very reluctant to file this report. i had an experience a year and a half ago which i did not disclose until 6 days ago when i filed my first report with mufon. i spoke to an investigator on monday, and then i had this terrifying experience on tuesday. i have not seen anything since my first sighting in 2009. now, one day after talking to your investigator, i have been visited up close and personal. i am not saying that one led to the other, but it is a very eerie coincidence. i was out on my deck tuesday night and i noticed a few "flashing stars," not unlike what i had seen in my first report. it was 9 o'clock. these "stars" were then accompanied by these randomly flashing orbs that were descending to rooftop level. then i saw a bright red flashing object low to the ground. it was not a plane, and it disappeared after a minute or two. after that, the real chaos began. around 9:30, i noticed a huge streak of blue/white light flash across the sky, and after that, they were everywhere. little flashes of what looked like laser beams, but they were coming from all directions and not from one source in the sky. there was a bright hovering orb directly in front of my house, and these little flashes of light were surrounding me. one came within 5 feet of me. they were constant. i was quite scared. i ran inside and called my brother to let him know what was happening, when i heard a helicopter fly over my house so low that i was almost shouting to make myself heard on the phone. i was on the phone for about 10 minutes, and in that time i counted 3 more helicopters and 2 planes fly directly over my house. they must have been very low for me to hear them from inside my home while on the telephone. after i hung up, i went back out on to the deck. at this time, there were planes and helicopters everywhere, but the bright orb in the sky was still above me (about a block or two away and the height of the planes flying at it) but hovering, not flying. the flashes of light were still all around. some were in the distance, some were high in the sky, some were on the street, and some were in the alley directly in front of me. i began to feel strange. not ill, but my stomach began to feel very odd. it was uncomfortable.. almost an empty feeling as if i hadn't eaten in days. at this time i was getting really worried, and the helicopters kept coming. the flashing beam phenomenon was practically happening on my deck, so i quickly came back inside out of fear. i called around and found that some of my neighbors were also aware of the heavy air traffic. one had actually heard all the commotion while in the shower and had gotten dressed and gone outside to see if there was an air raid or something. none had witnessed the lasers or orbs, but these were so low and directly in front of my house... so unless you were in my backyard, they would have been obstructed by other houses and trees. the 10-20 planes in the sky at any given time were visible to everyone though. i am sure that others had to have seen what i witnessed last night. i watched all of this go on for about an hour total. i was home alone, so i was very disturbed, especially since the lights were coming so close to me. i came back inside and continued to hear planes and helicopters go by one after another until about 11:30. around that time, i went back outside and saw that the bright orb was moving away from my house toward the farms and fields beyond. i watched it move slowly away, still flashing beams of light in the distance. the planes were still flying by. i went back out at 12:30 and the orb was gone. in it's place there were two sets of three lights in the shape of triangles, with planes flying at them. by this time, my mind was exhausted, and i just couldn't comprehend anything else, so i came inside and tried to go to bed. wednesday morning i found out that my father had also seen strange orbs in the woods by the creek on his property earlier that night, around 8 o'clock. he said they looked like lanterns, but were sporadic and would disappear after a few seconds. i am not sure that they are related, but he lives about 25 minutes from me, and it is very odd that we both saw similar phenomenon on the same night after almost 2 years of not seeing anything else substantial. i am at a loss for words when it comes to describing just how unreal and amazing last night's events were. there must be someone else out there that witnessed that same thing. it left northumberland pa and headed toward danville pa around 11:30-12. anyone driving route 11 at that time must have noticed an unusual number of low flying planes if not the orb and flashes themselves.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were driving east bound on littleton bllv. by broadway when a bright green fireball caught the side of my eye. i thought it was a comet of some sort, maybe made of copper since it burnt green, until it vanished. it was bright geenish blue and it had what looked like chunks breaking off in tiny fireballs. it looked like a giant firework but it was shot down at the earth not up into the sky. the whole incedent only lasted between 10 and 20 sec but the object seemed to vanish when it got to around 10000 feet. there was no more fire but when it vanished it looked like spikes comming from where it dissapeared. i couldnt explain anything. i was awestruck and got the chills.
content.summary: Green fire ball fell out of the sky from 25000 feet and disapeared at 10000 feet

content.detailedDescription:
Report written by mufon s.T.A.R. field investigator *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) virginia (witness).

at around 06:12 am in the morning, i was sitting in my vehicle at a worksite located at a new high school building that was being built in berryville, va, a few miles off route 7.  i was parked facing east as i was watching the sky change color from the sunrise.  then my attention was drawn to a bright, white light that appeared right above a dark elongated cloud. strangely, i also noticed that the light���s trajectory did not behave as to a plane���s takeoff light, the flight pattern was vertical.   the light soon disappeared behind the cloud ribbon but oddly enough, it did not emerge above it ��� [see a on diagram].   about a minute later, i saw what seems to be another white light moving upward but slightly to the left of the first sighting and it also vanished behind a cloud ��� [see b].   these lights were slightly larger and brighter in comparison to what i believe to be the planet venus that was positioned e/se above the horizon.  each sighting lasted about 5 to 6 seconds prior losing them behind cloud cover.
 
investigator���s notes: airliners' white takeoff lights should have been turned off at that altitude and even if these planes were facing me (westerly flight-path) they would have eventually flown at an angle or over my area.  no other navigational strobes or beacons were detected. dulles international airport is approximately 30 miles e and a smaller airport, leesburg executive airport is about 18 miles from where i was parked.

[weather]
25 ���f   
average humidity: 54	
wind speed: 3.5 mph (north)	
visibility: 10 miles, partly cloudy
content.summary: Two bright lights disappeared behind cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription: I looked out the window about 1:17 am into our backyard(facing wnw)because the moon was bright and mayby i would see a deer. i saw a bright object with strobing red, white, yellow colors. my fist thought was that must be one of those stars that is old and flashs a lot. my second thought was no it looks to close to be a star, it must be a helicopter because of the way they can hoover. then i realized i had seen this before  and mayby it's a satellite, but why all the strobing colors? so back to the hellicopter thought i stepped outside to see if i could hear it. no sound. i went back into the house and got the binoculars. i went to the window and looked through the window and now its about 5 minutes later and it seemed to be moving very slowly to the nw horizon because now it was closer to the outline of the huge tree that we have in our back yard. so i went back outside to look through the binoculars and i saw the strobe pattern change from circular to triangular, and then to an upright long triangular shape and i was trying hard not to move the binoculars by resting my elbows on the deck railing. so i kept looking through the binoculars and it just kept moving more towards the wnw and i stopped watching it around 1:30 am. buy then it was behind our backyard tree. so later today i tried to search for ufo sightings in nh and found this sight. i do not think that it was a satellite it seemed to close to the earth to be out there with the planets.
content.summary: I looked out the window because of the brightness of the moon to see anything and saw stobing colors.

content.detailedDescription: I was cooking dinner that night and as i waited for the water to boil i looked out the window in my living room area of my house and i saw one bright light so i went over the the window and looked out and saw that light gradually get closer. then, i looked off to the left of it and there were two more lights but the one in the middle of the 3 i could barely see the body. it was long and cigar shaped with a single light in the front. almost as if it was leading the group. at first i thought it was just a military formation but i heard no sounds coming from the crafts and i don't recall any military or commercial aircraft that are shaped like a cigar. they moved in a straight line but as they got closer to my apartment building they slowed to a stop above it but i lost sight of it after it positioned itself above my apartment building. so i rushed out side of my apartment to look out and i saw nothing. not even in the air in all direction i looked. after the incident i just felt amazed that i saw this because it was my first ufo encounter in my life.
content.summary: Formation of long cigar shaped crafts flying over my apartment building. triangle formation.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a video that was posted by a friend of mine who would like to remain anonymous. the video depicts unidentified lights over the sacramento california area that does things that defy the laws of physics and gravity. the video was taken on or around 02-20-2011. please review this video on his youtube channel and tell me what you think *(wit's email address deleted--cms/sg).

(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Strange lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was two blocks east of 18th ave and cambie st in vancouver. i was going to my truck to get my jacket and looked west up in the sky (something i'm always doing i think in this case though i was looking up to see what the weather was like) it was clear skies for the most part. my gf's street is has a lot of trees on it so the spot i looked up was really one of the few openings i could see from where my truck was parked.  i could see planes flying off in the distance, but something different caught my attention. 

there was a bright orange object in the sky. i would say a little larger and a little brighter than what a planet looks like in the sky only this was orange in color. it seemed pretty far away, i would say at least a few miles. that's what stuck out initially. i told my gf to look at it (she is very skeptical about this type of stuff) while i grabbed my jacket quick. she even made some comments that it didn't look like a plane or anything (you could see another plane north west of it with marker lights and everything). i stood there for another minute and watched it move. the orange object made kind of a clockwise circular movement and then at the 6oclock position it started to move in a straight line and then stopped. we now began to walk west towards cambie st hoping to get a better vantage point. i was even tripping a few times on the sidewalk as i was glued to the sky. once we got a better view i stopped because it started to get dimmer. my view was framed to the left by a large tree, the bottom by a house, and to the right was a smaller tree. the orange object was located i would say about a 45o angle of elevation. as it was fading (slowly) it wasn't moving it only flickered a few times. i paid attention to the fact that it wasn't moving over anything on the horizon. and then just like that it was gone. and i went on with my night. 

the sighting was really fast, i only had my cell phone and don't think it would have showed that well. i think my drawings will better represent what we saw. my gf can verify everything we saw from the movement, it's brightness, and it fading to nothing while not moving.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange object random movements then fades or disappears

content.detailedDescription: At approximately eight o clock pm on wednesday february 23rd. my wife and i were traveling south bound on us 93 from wells nevada towards laugies junction. off to the south west we saw an orange light in the sky that appeared and faded. a few moments later it appeared again along with two others they all became bright orange and the faded. this happened about three or four times. the last time that we saw the anomaly the orange light to the left of the other two shot out about four more orange lights then they all faded away. i have traveled this same highway many times over the years and i have seen orange lights in the sky a few times in the past year and this was the most interesting observation yet.
content.summary: Orange lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on a country dirt road twords nortonville, when a bright object in front and slightly to the right of me up in the sky caught my attention.

i observed what appeared to be a brilliantly lit pencil or cigar shape, which quickly changed shape or moved to a horizontal positon.  

whatever the object was i observed, it glowed brilliantly and was beautiful!

quickly thereafter the object moved or changed into a sphere, and promply disappeared or accelerated out of sight in moments.

there were no other object or aircraft in the sky at the time, or the remainder of my trip into nortonville, kansas.

i have no idea what it was that i saw, but the entire event elapsed no more than 30 seconds, and i would have missed it completely, except that the object glowed so brilliantly, it drew my attention.

i prefer to remain anonymous; do not want any contact nor attention; the only reason i'm reporting the event at all, is my curriousity what it was i observed, and if anyone else saw something similar around the same date(s) and time.
content.summary: Shape-shifter, vertical cigar to horizontal cigar to sphere

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i had just got finished shopping at a local asian market located near the intersection of 66th st and park ave in pinellas park. we were standing in the parking lot sipping on the coffee we had just bought. a low flying airplane roughly 1/4 to 1/2 mile away in a landing pattern caught my attention. the plane was heading north towards the airport. i was looking east. as i followed the aircraft i noticed a smaller object above it traveling southeast at a slow rate of speed. i thought it as another plane at first  but i quickly noticed there were no wings. it's hard to say how far away it was or exactly how large it was. it was a whitish sphere shaped object and traveled at a slow but steady rate of speed. i had watched it roughly 1 minute when i  began trying to point the object out to my wife to see what she thought of it.  she couldn't spot it so i began giving her landmarks to go off of. (ex-see the telephone pole? directly above that about an inch.)  she still couldn't see it and as i watched it, it appeared to come towards us. it seemed to get larger and all of a sudden it began to emit a light. my wife then noticed the object. the light became extremely bright in a matter of 2 seconds or so then faded out. i saw the object for maybe 1 more second and then it just disappeared. my wife could no longer see the object either. the light that came out of the object was different than any light i have ever seen. i can't really compare it to any thing else. it was a whitish-blue color. very bright. i know this sounds strange but it's as if  i could feel it . i had a very peaceful feeling immediately afterwards. my wife and i were (and still are) very excited about seeing this. we stayed for a few more minutes and decided to go home. the time  was 5:55pm. on the way home we stopped at a publix to return a movie and upon exiting the store (6:30pm) we saw 3 low flying military helicopters flying in the direction of the airport (clearwater/st pete). the airport from this direction is se. the store is located at the intersection of missouri ave and lakeveiw dr. we often see coast guard helicopters, especially in the summer but i have never seen these particular type helicopters in this area. maybe it was coincidence. but they were there.
content.summary: A sphere shape object traveling southeast at a slow rate of speed. whitish in color. turned into a very bright light and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: It was between 4:30'ish and 5'ish.  i was laying in bed and looked out my window and saw 2 lights (one extremely bright) so i focused on the brightest.  both of them moved north slowly.  the smaller one dimmed out very quickly.  the brightest one moved very slowly and once it dimmed it's lights it shot out (i could see it because the light wasn't completely out) very quickly and in an erratic pattern. it was nothing like a plane moves.  i was stunned and amazed.  i listened to the news and looked in the papers for any reports but haven't found any.  i can't say if it had sound or not because i sleep with earplugs to drown our my husbands snoring.  i sure would like to know if anyone else saw what i saw.
content.summary: Bright lights (2) moving slow and dimmed and shot away

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home shortly after 9 pm talking on my cell phone with my fiance when i noticed a triangle of lights, two red lights in the "back" of the object and one bright "spot light" or "headlight" in the front of the craft.  it looked like the light was just shining ahead, it was probably 50-75 feet above the trees it was over, which was up a hillside from where i was at, so it was about 500 feet or so from me.  when i noticed the craft i immediately told my fiance what i was seeing and i pulled over into a parking lot directly down the hillside from where the object was (next to a building that says "uncle charlie's sausage" on the side).  i was trying to explain it away to her and myself as a helicopter searching for something or someone, but as i stated above the light was just shining forward, not at the ground or anything except maybe the tree tops.  i also realized at this point after i had gotten out of my vehicle that the thing was making absolutely no noise, there was a train running about a quarter to half mile behind me and i could hear it, but not this craft that was much closer to me.  that had me worried but i was still trying to explian it away, after i had watched it hover above the tree line for what seemed like forever but was probably only a minute or so, it began slowly moving up to my left and away from the trees, it turned off the front spot light and i then saw it had a third red light up front as well that matched the back two.  i assume the spot light was so bright i couldn't see the third red light at first.  i don't believe the red lights were blinking like a regular air crafts would be.  it slowly moved up higher and toward some thin clouds, it briefly turned the spot light back on for about ten seconds, then back off again.  i watched the red triangle of lights maybe another 30 seconds until i couldn't see it anymore.  i'm not sure what happened, it either turned off all lights or sped off.  the clouds it was near weren't thick enough to conceal the lights.  i then got in my car and continued home.  i wanted to report this just to see if anyone else had reported anything in the area, or i there was indeed some kind of air craft in the area at that time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangle silent object with three red lights and one "headlight" moving slowly then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
While traveling south on garry oaks drive in citrus heights at 8:30pm, i spotted 3 very bright lights in the sky ahead of me. the lights were amber/orange in color. i watched for a moment and then pulled over to get a better look. the lights were traveling from south to north and passed just off my left side. i was parked at approximately: n38 42.558 w121 15.720. 
when i first spotted the lights, they were at an approximate heading of 170 degrees from my location at an elevation of approximately 25-30 degrees above the horizon. they were 3 independent lights and were traveling together, though not in a fixed formation. i estimate the visual magnitude of the lights to be at least -4 or brighter. their brightness varied and they seemed to occasionally change heading, but maintained a consistent south-to north track across the sky. during observation, they changed positions relative to each other. they sky was clear and i could see the star field between and behind the lights. i estimate the altitude of the objects to be between 500-1000 feet agl. i was able to capture video of the object movement on my mobile phone.
based on the speed and movement of the objects, i believe they were some sort of aircraft, but they did not move like a typical helicopter or fixed-wing aircraft. their behavior was more like an ultralight. i could not see any wingtip navigation (red/green) lights. i could occasionally glimpse some structure to one of the objects, but not clearly enough to identify it.
when the lights were directly across from me (east of my location), their elevation was approximately 40-45 degrees above the horizon. they continued on a northerly track, roughly in the direction of the city of rocklin. i left the area when the objects were low to the horizon to the north, just above rooftop level from my view. total observation time was probably 5-10 minutes.
the attached video is 2 separate clips and has been processed to reduce file size. the original video is in 3gp format and is approximately 107mb in total size.
content.summary: 3 bright amber lights moving slowly from south to north
Daylight clear orange sphere

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 1965 or 66 i was with my friend and her brother we were pulling him on a tube around noon on lake sylvan in rome city, indiana. the ufo hovered above us about 200 ft in the air. we turned the boat motor off and pulled davey into the boat. we looked up and laughed and made fun, thinking it was a hoax balloon or something. it was orange, yellow and maybe red, and round like a sauser. but we all suddenly got a feeling that something was reading our minds and we all got scared. it took off suddenly to one end of the lake and turned as if putting on a show just for us and zoomed accross us up in to the sky to a pencil lead size in seconds. we got the boat started and ran to the shore where people were lined up looking up at it and it was on the radio that a ufo was over lake sylvan. lots of people saw it that day.
content.summary: Ufo over lake

content.detailedDescription:
On feb. 10, 2011 between the hours of 11am - 11:30am i was relaxing in my hottub looking east.I observed a single luminous object which traveled from east to west then paired up with another luminous object which appeared to be almost stationary.  the second object was noticed only because i was tracking the first object.  also, because it was slightly behind me @ 1:00 position.

detailed version:
on a perfect clear day while relaxing in my hot tub at approximately  11:10am i noticed a luminous object traveling west to southwest. i didn���t see any wings on it or a trail behind it like an airplane, this caught my attention.  it was at a extreme altitude, and would of went un-noticed if i wasn���t wearing sunglasses. i tracked this object as it slowly started to change direction to northwest.  with binoculars i tracked it over head,and i couldn't hear any type of engine noise. this object had no wings, and a very bright white light on the bottom.This light did blink, but not in a regular constant on-off pattern.  as this object past overhead, and past the roof line i moved to get a better view.  i was now looking towards west @1:00 position.I called my 22 year old daughter outside of the house to witness what i was seeing. the first object i was tracking paired up with another luminous object that went un-noticed until up to this point.  the two objects i observed with binoculars seemed to be stationary with a short distance between them.  they appeared like two stars in the daytime sky for about 5 to 10 minutes.
my daughter and i watched these two objects until they slowly went out of view.
content.summary: Two luminious objects pairing up one stationary and one that moved from east to west to meet up with the one that appeared to be stationary

content.detailedDescription: I hope i do this report correctly an half way decent an that it makes sense..I never did this before but i will try my best because i truly feel it is very important to keep track of these bad boys because its starting to look like there go's the neighborhood with are the unknowns<><><> i live in a wooded area off a dirt road and every other day in the early evening with just enough day light i go for my power walk. it was tuesday feb.22nd, the sky was quite clear so i got dressed an ready.. i step outside about around 6pm still a little sun light but not much.. i began my walk in the west bound direction from my home.. it was starting to get dark quickly an the stars were showing up so i get about 2 1/2 miles down the road on my route then i turned around an start heading back east bound by then its pretty much dark.. i could see stars every where an air craft as well.. now mind you i am believer in u.F.O's and i have seen strange things in the sky so yeah every time i step out im looking towards the heavens with an open mind.. anyways i got about a half a mile to go to get home and still looking at the stars as i walk when suddenly to the north of me in the sky above my head i spotted a flash of light an the color was strange like them black lights they sell at the store.. so its blinking an flashing how ever i could not make out the shape just a flash.. now this thing  was not moving so i stop walking dead on my tracks to study this flash when suddenly it stops for a minute or two then it starts to flash again an still holding its position an not moving or flying just there but then it stops again an i see nothing but the stars so i took my time looking for it an i even look around in different directions to see if it moved an nothing,nada,zip! an i must of stood their investigating 12 or 15 min.S but nothing it is gone gone, vanished what have you which was needless to say weird an strange so it was time to move on so i took off when not even a minute i look behind me to the west an i see a very bright star like but i know its not a star because its moving and towards my general direction but very very slow.. so i say to myself ok here we go again its time for code observation.. my position is a few miles west of mt. pleasant mi. middle of a back dirt road in the dark wooded area in stickville an approximately between 6:45 n 7:00 p.M.Ok so i waited patiently as it got closer but there is no sound whats so ever, nothing and the way that it flys nice n slow like a sail boat on a calm smooth ocean.. now its close enough to try n make out a detailed description.. yeah right.. it was low like no higher then a radio tower absolutely soundless and the shape a perfect circle sphere a very bright orb and size? no bigger then a full size van an no smaller then a ol german bug wagon and the way it made me feel like yeah a bit scared but very fascinated, very privileged, it was amazing it really was a mix of emotions .. i kept watching it till it faded away but the thing is when i first noticed it from the west it was about 3 miles away more or less and very bright but as it passed away not even a mile away it faded, diminish as though it went into another dimension and that's what it look like to me.. one other thing that i think is important, this is not the first time that i have seen sphere's orbs ..In this area alone in the last 2 years i have witness 6 or 7 and 1 in the early morning day light back in the fall and it was still a bright light orb with the sun up.. i do have a vid clip of 1 and its very bouncy in the frame being that i had no time to set the tripod and also it appears that it always begins from the west to the east, exactly the same path and exactly same altitude, another words it seems to begin and end with the same route.. i have been seeing these orbs since the mid 90's where i grew up in chesaning mich. which is 1-hour s.East of mt.Pleasant... keep your eye's open towards the heavens my unknowns with an open mind and patients an your bound to see an unknown....Peace & love...
content.summary: From a distance a bright star then as it moved closer  a ball of light.. as it passed close over me  a very bright orb .. approximate size standard airplane.No sound!!!
